00020 MailList::MailList( QPointer<Account> account, QObject* parent ) : QObject( parent )
00021 {

00025 MailList::~MailList(){
00026 
00027   //delete all mails
00028   QListIterator<Mail*> iter( mails );
00029   while( iter.hasNext() )
00030   {
00031     Mail* mail = iter.next();
00032     delete mail;
00033   }
00034   
00035 }

00037 Mail* MailList::addMail( long number, const QString& unid, bool isNew )
00038 {
00039   //create the mail object
00040   Mail* mail = new Mail( number, unid, isNew, acc, this );
00041 
00042   //append it to the list
00043   mails.append( mail );
00044         
00045         return mail;
00046 }

00048 void MailList::print() const
00049 {
00050   QListIterator<Mail*> iter( mails );
00051   while( iter.hasNext() )
00052   {
00053     Mail* mail = iter.next();
00054     mail->print();
00055     cout << "------------------" << endl;
00056   }
00057 }

00059 bool MailList::hasMail(QString uid)
00060 {
00061   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00062   bool found = false;                             //True, when the wanted mail was found
00063 
00064   while( it.hasNext() && !found )
00065   {
00066     Mail* mail = it.next();
00067      
00068     //compare the uid
00069     if( mail->getUNID() == uid )
00070     {
00071       found = true;
00072     }
00073   }
00074   return found;
00075 
00076 }
00077 
00078 bool MailList::isNew(QString uid) const
00079 {
00080   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00081   bool found = false;                             //True, when the wanted mail was found
00082   bool newMail = false;                           //at time we have not found it, therefore the return value is false
00083 
00084   while( it.hasNext() && !found )
00085   {
00086     Mail* mail = it.next();
00087 
00088     kdDebug() << "compare: " << uid << " " << mail->getUNID() << endl;
00089     //compare the uid
00090     if( mail->getUNID() == uid )
00091     {
00092       found = true;
00093       newMail = mail->isNew();
00094     }
00095   }
00096 
00097   return newMail;
00098 }

00100 void MailList::setSize( long number, long size )
00101 {
00102   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00103   bool found = false;                  //True, when the wanted mail was found
00104 
00105   //looking for the mail with the number 'number'
00106   while( it.hasNext() && !found )
00107   {
00108     Mail* mail = it.next();
00109     
00110     //if the current mail has the given number, decode the mail
00111     if( mail->getNumber() == number )
00112     {
00113       mail->setSize( size );
00114       found = true;
00115     }
00116   }
00117 }

00119 Types::MailNumberList_Type MailList::getNewMails()
00120 {
00121   MailNumberList_Type numberList;  //contains the numbers of the new mails
00122 
00123   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails ); //iterator for the mail list
00124 
00125   //iterate over all mails
00126   while( it.hasNext() )
00127   {
00128     Mail* mail = it.next();
00129     
00130     //if current mail is new append its number to the mail number list
00131     if( mail->isNew() )
00132       numberList.append( mail->getNumber() );
00133   }
00134 
00135   return numberList;
00136 }

00158 QStringList MailList::getUIDsOfOldMails( )
00159 {
00160   QStringList list;                 //contains the UIDs of the old mails
00161   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails ); //iterator for the mail list
00162 
00163   //iterate over all mails
00164   while( it.hasNext() )
00165   {
00166     //get next Mail
00167     Mail* mail = it.next();
00168     
00169     //if current mail is new append its number to the mail number list
00170     if( !mail->isNew() )
00171       list.append( mail->getUNID() );
00172   }
00173 
00174   return list;
00175 }

00177 QStringList MailList::getHeaderOf( QString unid ) throw( CorruptDataException )
00178 {
00179   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00180 
00181   //looking for the mail with the UID 'uid'
00182   while( it.hasNext() )
00183   {
00184     //get next mail
00185     Mail* mail = it.next();
00186     
00187     //if the current mail has the given uid, get the header
00188     if( mail->getUNID() == unid )
00189     {
00190       return mail->getHeader();
00191     }
00192   }
00193 
00194   //nothing found
00195   throw CorruptDataException( "No mail with unid " + unid + " found in mail list" );
00196 }

00226 void MailList::applyHeaderFilter( HeaderFilter * filter, QString account, MailNumberList_Type& deleteList, MailToDownloadMap_Type& downloadList, int& nmbIgnoredMails, FilterLog* log )
00227 {
00228 
00229   MailNumberList_Type mailsToIgnore;  //this list holds the numbers of all mails, which shall be ignored
00230 
00231   //Loop over all mails in this list
00232   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );
00233   while( it.hasNext() )
00234   {
00235 
00236     Mail* pElem = it.next();
00237     
00238     //apply the filters to the current mail
00239     QString mailbox;
00240     FilterAction_Type action = pElem->applyHeaderFilter( filter, account, mailbox, log );
00241 
00242     //do recommend action
00243     //we don't need to do everything for action MARK, because Mail::applyHeaderFilter() marks the mail entry itself
00244     struct DownloadActionParams_Type params;
00245     switch( action )
00246     {
00247       case FActDelete     : deleteList.append( pElem->getNumber() ); break;
00248       case FActMove       : params.action = FActMove;
00249                             params.mailbox = mailbox;
00250                             downloadList.insert( pElem->getNumber(), params );
00251                             break;
00252       case FActIgnore     : mailsToIgnore.append( pElem->getNumber() ); break;
00253       case FActSpamcheck  : params.action = FActSpamcheck;
00254                             downloadList.insert( pElem->getNumber(), params );
00255       default          : break;
00256     }
00257   }
00258 
00259   //remove all mails which shall be ignored from the mail list
00260   nmbIgnoredMails = mailsToIgnore.count();
00261   MailNumberList_Type::iterator iter;
00262   for ( iter = mailsToIgnore.begin(); iter != mailsToIgnore.end(); ++iter )
00263     removeMail( *iter );
00264 
00265 }
00266 
00267 void MailList::removeMail( int number )
00268 {
00269   QMutableListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00270 
00271   //looking for the mail with the number 'number'
00272   while( it.hasNext() )
00273   {
00274     Mail* mail = it.next();
00275 
00276     //if the current mail has the given number, remove it
00277     if( mail->getNumber() == number )
00278       it.remove();
00279   }
00280 }

00282 void MailList::saveMails( QDomDocument& doc, QDomElement& parent )
00283 {
00284   //Loop over all mail items
00285   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );
00286   while( it.hasNext() )
00287   {
00288     Mail* mail = it.next();
00289     mail->save( doc, parent );
00290   }
00291 }

00294 QString MailList::getSenderOf( int number ) const
00295 {
00296   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00297   bool found = false;                             //True, when the wanted mail was found
00298   QString sender;                                 //sender of the wanted mail
00299 
00300   //looking for the mail with the number 'number'
00301   while( it.hasNext() && !found )
00302   {
00303     Mail* mail = it.next();
00304     
00305     //if the current mail has the given number, remove it
00306     if( mail->getNumber() == number )
00307     {
00308       sender = mail->getFrom();
00309       found = true;
00310     }
00311   }
00312   return sender;
00313 }

00315 QString MailList::getDateOf( int number ) const
00316 {
00317   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00318   bool found = false;                             //True, when the wanted mail was found
00319   QString date;                                   //sent date of the wanted mail
00320 
00321   //looking for the mail with the number 'number'
00322   while( it.hasNext() && !found )
00323   {
00324     Mail* mail = it.next();
00325 
00326     //if the current mail has the given number, remove it
00327     if( mail->getNumber() == number )
00328     {
00329       date = mail->getDateTime().toString( KDateTime::LocalDate );
00330       found = true;
00331     }
00332   }
00333   return date;
00334 
00335 }

00403 QStringList MailList::decodeMailBody( const QStringList& body, int number, bool preferHTML ) const
00404 {
00405   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00406 
00407   //looking for the mail with the number 'number'
00408   while( it.hasNext() )
00409   {
00410 
00411     Mail* mail = it.next();
00412     
00413     //if the current mail has the given number, decode the mail
00414     if( mail->getNumber() == number )
00415     {
00416       return mail->decodeMailBody( body, preferHTML );
00417     }
00418   }
00419 
00420   //nothing found
00421   return QStringList();
00422 
00423 }

00425 void MailList::writeToMoveLog( FilterLog * log, int number, QString account, QString mailbox )
00426 {
00427   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00428   bool found = false;                             //True, when the wanted mail was found
00429 
00430   //looking for the mail with the number 'number'
00431   while( it.hasNext() && !found )
00432   {
00433                 Mail* mail = it.next();
00434                 
00435     //if the current mail has the given number, set the header
00436     if( mail->getNumber() == number )
00437     {
00438       mail->writeToMoveLog( log, account, mailbox );
00439       found = true;
00440     }
00441   }
00442 }

00482 int MailList::getNumberNewMails( )
00483 {
00484   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00485   int number = 0;                                 //number of new mails
00486 
00487   while( it.hasNext() )
00488   {
00489     Mail* mail = it.next();
00490 
00491     //increment number, if this mail is new
00492     if( mail->isNew() )
00493       number++;
00494   }
00495 
00496   return number;
00497 }

00499 long MailList::getTotalSize( )
00500 {
00501   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );   //iterator for the mail list
00502   long size = 0;                                   //total size of all mails
00503 
00504   while( it.hasNext() )
00505   {
00506     Mail* mail = it.next();
00507 
00508     size += mail->getSize();
00509   }
00510 
00511   return size;
00512 }

00514 
00515 void MailList::readStoredMails( QDomElement& parent )
00516 {
00517   //clear the list
00518   mails.clear();
00519 
00520   //get first DOM node (mail)
00521   QDomNode n = parent.firstChild();
00522 
00523   //iterate over all mail items stored in the given account
00524   while( !n.isNull() )
00525   {
00526     //get element of the current node
00527     QDomElement e = n.toElement();
00528                 
00529     //get values
00530     int number = e.attribute( ATTRIBUTE_MAIL_NUMBER ).toInt();
00531     int size = e.attribute( ATTRIBUTE_MAIL_SIZE ).toInt();
00532     QString unid = e.attribute( ATTRIBUTE_MAIL_UID );
00533     QDomElement subelem = e.namedItem( ITEM_MAIL_HEADER ).toElement();
00534     QStringList header = subelem.text().split( HEADER_SEPARATOR );
00535 
00536     //create mail
00537                 Mail* mail = addMail( number, unid, false );
00538                 
00539                 //set other values
00540                 mail->setSize( size );
00541                 mail->setHeader( header );
00542 
00543     //get next DOM node
00544     n = n.nextSibling();
00545   }
00546 }
00547 
00548 QList<Mail> MailList::getAllMails() const
00549 {
00550         QList<Mail> list;
00551   QListIterator<Mail*> it( mails );
00552 
00553   while( it.hasNext() )
00554   {
00555     Mail* mail = it.next();
00556 
00557     list.append( *mail );
00558   }
00559         return list;
00560 }
